holes.original_proof:
apply Finset.sum_bij' (fun (j : ℕ) _ => j) (fun (j : ℕ) _ => j)
simp_all [Finset.mem_Icc, Finset.mem_range, Nat.lt_succ_iff]

classical
have h₁₀ : ∑ j in Finset.range (n + 1), 2 ^ (n - j) * (Nat.choose (n + j) j) = 4 ^ n :=
  by
  have h₁₁ : ∑ j in Finset.range (n + 1), 2 ^ (n - j) * (Nat.choose (n + j) j) = 4 ^ n :=
    by
    have h₁₂ : ∀ n : ℕ, ∑ j in Finset.range (n + 1), 2 ^ (n - j) * (Nat.choose (n + j) j) = 4 ^ n :=
      by
      intro n
      induction n with
      | zero => simp
      | succ n ih =>
        rw [Finset.sum_range_succ', ih]
        simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Nat.choose_succ_succ, pow_succ, Nat.mul_succ, Nat.add_assoc] <;> ring_nf at * <;>
                    norm_num <;>
                  simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.mul_succ, Nat.add_assoc, Nat.pow_succ, Nat.mul_one, Nat.mul_zero,
                    Nat.add_zero] <;>
                norm_num <;>
              ring_nf at * <;>
            norm_num <;>
          linarith
    exact h₁₂ n
  exact h₁₁
exact h₁₀

intro n
induction n with
| zero => simp
| succ n ih =>
  rw [Finset.sum_range_succ', ih]
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Nat.choose_succ_succ, pow_succ, Nat.mul_succ, Nat.add_assoc] <;> ring_nf at * <;>
              norm_num <;>
            simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.mul_succ, Nat.add_assoc, Nat.pow_succ, Nat.mul_one, Nat.mul_zero,
              Nat.add_zero] <;>
          norm_num <;>
        ring_nf at * <;>
      norm_num <;>
    linarith
